body:
Guys i realise ive been putting out a lot of salt and unnecessary flame wars and yeah i do take some stuff too seriously, I appologize to all of you that i affected in a bad way, and i promise to never do it again. Im just a 13 yearold on the internet, again I appologize for the things ive done and im willing to fix it : )
Also if i get any rude comments ill probably not respond so another war doesnt start, but i will definitely read and try to apply to myself
Have a nice day

title: I appologize to Nocturne Apollo and Lgmatias

replies.body: Apology accepted, it's a natural reaction when the game gets heated and competitive. Just stick to your word. :)

replies.body:
I cba to make my own thread so ill just use yours

i also apologise for any beef or salt ive caused by accusing anyone or saying anything salty. I dont mean it personally it just kind happens.

This is specifically for apollo so i apologise nd hope we can atleast tolerate each other.
